summary: Website project including a centered clover logo in the header and a song file upload feature.
architectural_notes: Header logo should be a scalable vector (e.g., SVG/CSS shapes) to remain sharp on desktop and mobile.
Logo container should be a perfectly centered circle with equal width/height and black background; no text, shadows, gradients, or extra effects.

existing_features.title: Enable and verify the end-to-end song file upload feature so authenticated users can upload an audio file (and optional cover image) and see the newly uploaded track appear in the appropriate library views (public catalog and personal library) without errors.

Replace the current header logo icon rendering with a minimal, scalable four-leaf clover mark that matches the provided design constraints: a perfectly centered circular container with equal height/width, black background fill inside the circle, four equal rounded leaf shapes arranged in a balanced cross pattern touching seamlessly at the center (no visible gaps), rich premium green fill (not neon), and no text, shadows, gradients, or extra effects.

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement minimal clover logo in website header (circular container, black background, four green rounded leaves, scalable, no effects)

projectName: Enable song file uploads and implement minimal circular clover header logo
